ygData.subject: Re: Fighting Area
ygData.msgSnippet: Heyas Sarn :) I also am DE cleric on Veeshan, remember me by chance? I used some points in str on my character, so I think w/o any str items on, i have 76, I
ygData.messageBody:
Heyas Sarn :)

I also am DE cleric on Veeshan, remember me by chance? I used some points in
str on my character, so I think w/o any str items on, i have 76, I can get
away with wearing a few pieces of bronze, but doesn't take long to weigh you
down. Banded really isn't that much less AC <per item> so you have to pick
and choose which bronze pieces give you most bang for you buck. Also, there
are good items out there that you can get in unrest etc that have good AC
and sometimes some adds to stats that weigh much less and are obtainable
fairly early compared to the bigger gear items. <leather apron, bloodstained
mantle>

I've been struggling lately myself with my DE cleric, I am currently level
32 and its just getting tough to make experience..plus all I ever seem to do
anymore is med <G>

Anyway just my two cents worth :)

Jazebo D'Elysian Veeshan
-----Original Message-----
From: XxKommiexX@... <XxKommiexX@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, June 24, 1999 10:13 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Fighting Area


>From: XxKommiexX@...
>
>I bring up the issue of Dark Elf Clerics. I have said before that I only
have
>65 str. That is a bad thing at first, because I can get bronze before I can
>get all the awsome str increasing items. My question is, how does a Dark
Elf
>cleric go thru the early life with out having any str?
>
>Sarn, Dark Elf Cleric
>~Veeshan~
